description: This file defines the AppDatabase class using Room to manage a local database for storing notes in an Android application. It implements a singleton pattern for database instance creation with thread safety.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Abstract class representing the Room database for notes, providing an DAO for note operations and singleton instance management.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of AppDatabase, creating it if necessary, with thread safety ensured via synchronization.
